reviews.comments: Aníbal es muy amable, buena ubicación!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Tatyana! Saludos. :-)

reviews.comments: La ubicación no podía ser más perfecta no hubo nada que no fuese tal cual lo detalló en la publicación siempre predispuesto y flexible en cuanto a los horarios y el lugar no podía ser más cómodo realmente recomendable
reviews.response: Muchísimas gracias Lorena por regalarnos tan buena y generosa evaluación! ^_^ Podés contar con el Deptito toda vez que lo necesites. Saludos. :-)

reviews.comments: El departamento está bien ubicado y tiene una excelente disposición. Tiene hasta un buen placard donde guardar ropa y demás. Hay negocios alrededor, y a varias cuadras, el centro de la ciudad. Encontré las camas un poco angostas, no recomendables para gente de contextura grande.
reviews.response: Muchísimas gracias Viviana por tu generosa evaluación. Lamento que hayas encontrado las camas angostas, aún cuando en la descripción del lugar hayamos mencionado que cuenta con 2 somiers de 1 plaza. Procuraremos que esto quede aún más claro. Saludos. :-)

reviews.comments: Nos encantó el deptito cordobés, quedamos más que conformes con el lugar y con sus anfitriones, excelente trato, muy buena ubicación, cerca de todo. Vamos extrañar ese cálido lugar, por eso tenemos pensado volver pronto  gracias por todo Anibal y a tu tía que es un amor y nos espero para recibirnos más allá del retraso de nuestro micro. Muchas gracias! Saludos!
El departamento tiene lo necesario para una estadía cómoda. Aníbal estuvo pendiente y salió todo muy bien. ¡Gracias!
reviews.response: Muchísimas gracias Abel por tu buena onda al evaluarnos! :-) Abrazo grande.

reviews.comments:
El departamento es como se muestra en las fotos con un poco más de uso del que se ve. 
Anibal fue muy buen anfitrión.
El Dpto es comodo y tiene todo lo necesario para una estancia perfecta. Anibal y sra muy agradables y atentos con todo, fueron muy serviciales conmigo.Gracias!!
reviews.response: Muchísimas gracias Mauricio por tu generosa evaluación! Abrazón. :-)

reviews.comments: Buen departamento, bien ubicado, tal cual lo descriptivo por Aníbal y algo muy importante; muy buena cama, sin dudas volveriamos!!!
reviews.response: Uy Esteban, muchísimas gracias por tan generosa evaluación! Y mil disculpas por que se me pasó el plazo para hacértela a vos! Qué desastre. :-(

reviews.comments:
La estadía fue impecable, el deptito está totalmente equipado, tiene todo lo que uno puede necesitar. Destaco sobre todo la ubicación como estratégica de fácil acceso y cerca de los principales centros turísticos y comerciales de Córdoba.
Si bien el espacio es pequeño está muy bien aprovechado. Totalmente recomendable.
reviews.response: Muchísimas gracias Daniela por tu evaluación tan generosa! :-) Espero que ustedes estén muy bien, y no duden en contar con el deptito cada vez que lo quieran y/o necesiten! ;-) Cariños para vos y Santiago.

reviews.comments: Todo acordé a los comentarios y fotos. Aníbal super comunicativo. Siempre ofreciéndose ante cualquier duda o necesidad. El dpto está muy bien ubicado, cerca del centro y de lugares de actividad nocturna, en la zona está lleno de kioskos, mercados y lugares para comprar comida. Es clave que tenga a disposición la tarjeta para usar los buses, al igual que un teléfono celular por si no posees uno o dos extranjero. Sinceramente fue una gran experiencia. Pude compartir unas charlas con Aníbal y fue genial.

Anibal es muy buen anfitrion. El dpto., si bien es pequeño, tiene todo lo necesario para una buena estadia y esta decorado con muy buen gusto.
Nos sentimos muy a gusto. Seguramente volveremos.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Vir por tu evaluación generosa! Me alegro que se hayan sentido a gusto. Vuelvan cuando quieran! Abrazos. :-)

reviews.comments: Nos quedamos dos semanas en el Monoambiente, y la descripción del mismo, las fotos, son fieles a la realidad. Aníbal fue sumamente atento y flexible, para acordar hora de llegada y partida, limpieza, muy puntual y considerado. La Ubicación es excelente, a pocas cuadras del Centro de la ciudad, es segura, y con amplia disposición de locales para conseguir todo lo necesario.  Volvería a alojarme aquí! Lo recomiendo!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Vir por tu generosa evaluación! Abrazos, y vuelvan siempre! ;-)

reviews.comments: Un departamento pequeño pero completo, muy bien equipado y bien ubicado. Súper recomendable.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Dani por tu positiva y generosa evaluación!!! Te dejo un abrazón, y contá con el Deeptito cuando lo necesites. ;-)

reviews.comments:
El departamento es genial, cómodo y tal cual a las fotos que aparecen. Además la ubicación cercana al centro, lo hace práctico para poder ir sin auto. 
Muy buena predisposición del dueño antes y durante la estadía.

Me maravilló lo bien equipado que estaba el deptito. Bien pensado para todo lo que pudiera necesitar. Pero si hasta había un paraguas disponible! :) Mil gracias!
A pesar de ser de tamaño reducido, está tan bien decorado que no produce sensación de clastrofobia. Luminoso. Aireado. Impecable. Nos encantó.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Lore por tan positiva evaluación! :-D Serán bienvenidas cada vez que necesiten o quieran volver. Saludos! ^_^

reviews.comments: El departamento es muy cómodo, limpio, tiene todo lo que necesitas para sentirte en casa (incluido un televisor con un buen sistema de sonido perfecto para ver peliculas) y el internet funciona perfecto. El depto esta muy bien ubicado, tiene de todo cerca (verdulerias, panaderias, almacenes, farmacias, bares, y hasta una estación de servicio que tiene un servishop que está abierto las 24 hs justo al frente del departamento. Anibal es un anfitrión perfecto, muy atento, que se preocupa por el bienestar de sus huespedes, sin duda lo recomiendo y seguro estaré por ahí nuevamente.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Pato por darnos tan buena evaluación! ^_^

reviews.comments:
El deptito cordobés es espectacular!! Súper recomendable, y muy MUY bien equipado. La ubicación es muy buena: en pocos minutos se puede llegar al centro o al shopping.

Aníbal es el mejor anfitrión que uno podría pedir, se preocupó por hacernos sentir como en casa, y nos asistió cuando lo necesitamos. Estuvimos comunicados en todo momento, y sabíamos que teníamos alguien con quien contar si teníamos algún problema. Muy recomendable!
reviews.response: Gracias campeón por dejarnos tan buena evaluación! Fue un placer hospedarlos, así que cuenten con el Deptito para cuando lo necesiten (y esté disponible, claro). Abrazón! :-)

reviews.comments: Fue nuestra primer reserva x airbnb, la verdad todo perfecto! El Depto es tal cual las fotos, tiene todo lo que podes necesitar, nuestro viaje fue x motivos laborales pero para viajar x turismo tb esta genial, tanto Anibal como su tía son muy atentos siempre dispuestos a ayudar y a disipar inquietudes! Los súper recomiendo!!gracias por todo!!!
reviews.response: Muchísmas gracias Sole por dejarnos esta evaluación tan positiva! :-) Me alegro que hayan disfrutado del Deptito y espero vuelvan para poder conocerlas personalmente! Jeje. Gracias a ustedes por todo también. Abrazos y felicidades. ^_^

reviews.comments: Pasamos dos dias en Cordoba en el departamento de Anibal. Nos estaba esperando su tia a nuestra llegada para darnos excelente recepción y todas las explicaciones y recomendaciones. Está muy bien ubicado , cercano a shoping, lugares historicos , y mercados y casas de comidas.Las comodidades del inmueble mejor que en las fotos. No le falta nada que pueda necesitar , todo de buena calidad , y decorado con muy buen gusto.Charlamos con Anibal  el momento de despedirnos. Amable,  simpático y servicial .-Super recomendable
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias Arturo y Lily por tan buena evaluación! :-D
Vuelvan cuando gusten. Serán siempre bienvenidos!

reviews.comments: El departamento es tal como en cada imagen. Está perfectamente ordenado para que sea cómodo, y para que no falte absolutamente nada. El Anfitrión (Aníbal) está para lo que se necesite, muy cordial y genial predisposición, hasta me sorprendió con un desayuno listo para disfrutar al llegar por la mañana. La ubicación también es muy buena, cerca del centro (en solo cinco minutos caminando). De hecho, casi todo lo que hay en la zona del centro de Córdoba lo hice caminando. Volvería al mismo lugar. Lo recomiendo.
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias loco por tan buena recomendación!!!
Ya sabés: volvé cuando quieras!!! Fue un gustazo alojarte.
Abrazón.

reviews.comments: Nuestra estadía en el departamento de Aníbal fue excelente. Las comodidades y funcionalidades son inmejorables. Hasta estrenamos un DVD de primera marca !!!!. La cordialidad de Aníbal es única. Realmente 100 % recomendable.  MIL GRACIAS POR TODO !!!! Y... hasta la próxima !!!

hola queria expresar lo bien que nos sentimos en el dpto, ya qque es muy comodo y tiene hasta el ultimo detalle,tiene muy buena ubicacion! 
es hermoso y muy acogedor!!en cuanto a anibal muy amable y atento!
!desde ya la proxima visita a cordoba ireamos de nuevo aldpto de anibal: saludoss!!nos vemos pronto.
reviews.response: Gracias Dani!!! Serán más que bienvenidas! Divina la Feli, mandele un beso grande... Y, quién sabe? Capaz nos veamos en La Rioja antes de que vulevan! Jeje. Besos.

reviews.comments: Muy buen anfitrión. Super disponible, la zona de hubicacion del departamento cerca del centro.

el depto es excelente! cuenta con todas las comodidades, super practico, muy limpio y bien ubicado. La atencion  y la buena onda de Anibal es para destacar. Estuvo siempre disponible. 
Sinceramente fue ideal para nuestra estadia en Cordoba, no tuvimos ningun tipo de inconvenientes.

La estadía en casa de Anibal fue buena. La cama es cómoda y nos permitió descansar. La cocina estaba bien equipada. Anibal es muy amable, atento e informativo, es de mucha ayuda para saber que hacer en la ciudad.

El apartamento está muy bien ubicado. cercano a los atractivos principales de la ciudad y a una distancia caminable de lugares como el Parque Sarmiento o las cuadras de museos en la zona de Nueva Córdoba. Aníbal, nuestros anfitrión es cálido, atento y siempre disponible, recomendable al 100%.
reviews.response: Muchísimas gracias Santiago por tan generosa evaluación! Abrazo grande para ambos! :-)

reviews.comments: La estadía el deptito superó mis expectativas,  lomencontré tal cual las fotos y la descripción e incluso con muchos detalles que facilitaron mi estadía en Córdoba. Sin duda si volviera a cba el deptito sería la primera opción.  Aníbal un excelente host, amable, rápido me ayudó en muchos requerimientos adicionales y aparte fué hasta un amigo. Muchas gracias Aníbal espero algún día volver.
Genial departamento y Anibal, como anfitrión....mas que excelente. Nos acompaño en todo momento por Córdoba. Departamento recomendable pero mas recomendable conocer a Anibal.
reviews.response:
Juajuaaaaa!!! Qué exageraaadooo. X-D
Fue gracias a que ustedes se coparon con absolutamente TODAS mis propuestas. Jaja. No cualquiera!!! ;-)
Muchas gracias capo!!! :-D

reviews.comments: Muy buena onda anibal, y el monoambiente muy acogedor!

El departamento está muy bien ubicado, limpio y como las fotos. Aníbal es muy cordial y ofrece muchos detalles en el departamento para quedarse más cómodo.
Con toda certeza se regreso a Cordoba, me quedo aquí con todo gusto.
reviews.response: Gracias Caro!!! Será un placer recibirte de nuevo. Espero que la próxima vez te quedes más tiempo y tengas más disponibilidad para hacerte conocer un poco Córdoba! Besos.

reviews.comments: I was disappointed with this apartment, especially after reading the excellent reviews. I knew it would be small, but the place is older than how it looks in the photos. But my main issue was the people in the apartment above was very noisy, and even with earplugs it was difficult to sleep. They either fight, play loud music or move around furniture. Their favourite time for dragging around furniture is usually from 3AM to 5AM. If you go out very late in the nights it won’t bother you, but if you need to sleep early and you are sensitive to noise I would not recommend this apartment. The area is not unsafe, but the apartment is in a busy street and it isn’t my favourite area in Córdoba. I think this apartment was really expensive for what you get. I stayed in two other apartments in Córdoba for a similar or slightly higher price, but the places were larger and in better areas of the city. I hate to give such a negative review, because Aníbal is a good guy and the apartment had everything I needed(except the peace and quiet), but I would have appreciated a review like this, since I stayed there for a month.
reviews.response:
Oh man, I'm really sorry that you had such a bad experience with the neighbours and I didn't know about that on time to try to do anything to solve that. :-(
I appreciate the feedback though, and will,talk to them and ask them to stop makingo,noise at night. 
Also, I'm sorry that you found the apartment old... The pics were shot back in 2012, and the last time when we painted the walls was in 2015, so I guess it's time for a refresh.
Thanks for your honest and complete review Fanie, and I hope you are fine!

reviews.comments: Ótima experiência! Anibal sempre atencioso como sempre.
reviews.response: Muito obrigado Angelica pela sua generosa avaliação. Abraços, e que estejam muito bem! ^_^

reviews.comments: L'appartement est ideale et cozy proche du centre et du quartier Guemes (très à la mode). Compter 10 min de marche environ. Aníbal est très serviable et donne toutes les informations nécessaires pour passer un agréable séjour.
Ótimo estúdio, ideal para uma pessoa. Aníbal é um excelente anfitrião, sempre pensando sobre as necessidades do hóspede nos mínimos detalhes. Amei!
reviews.response: Muito obrigado Angelica pela tua avaliação! Grande abraço, e volte sempre! :-)

reviews.comments: Nice studio, host very friendly and obliging, everything was fine!

Aníbal and his aunt are fantastic hosts. As for the apartment, it’s cool, clean, has good wi-fi connection, and it’s close to supermarkets, bars, restaurants, etc. I really liked the neighborhood too, I walked around the area a lot, even late at night, and it seemed pretty safe to me. I’d definitely stay at Aníbal’s apartment again.
reviews.response: Thank you Paulo! I'm very happy that you liked it (and that you liked us) as much as you say! :-)

reviews.comments:
Even if we unfortunately did not meet Anibal personally, he was a perfect host. He responded to every question we had in a few minutes and helped us to check in and out without problems.

The apartment is just a descripted and on the pictures. It was clean and comfy and we had everything we needed.

The location is just about a few minute walk to the center and even at night, you will feel save enough to walk back home in this area.

Thank you so much Anibal! We would always come again!
Apartment was cosy and conveniently located!
reviews.response:
Thanks man for your positive review and comments! I truly appreciate them.
Abrazón! :-)

reviews.comments: Couldn't be more pleased with the experience. Anibal welcomed me with open arms and made me feel at home in Cordoba. Thanks!!
reviews.response: Thanks so much broda' for such a loving comment!!!  Abrazón queridazo!

reviews.comments: Aníbal's place was perfect for a long term stay in Cordoba. Close to everything you need to buy or do. Places to buy food are a few steps away from the door of the building. The center of Cordoba is a short walk away. For the places that aren't within walking distance, cabs in Cordoba are plentiful and you can wave one just outside of the building.
reviews.response: Thank you Murillo for your generous review! I'm very happy you've enjoyed it. Come back whenever you want to! You'll be very welcome. ;-)

reviews.comments:
Apartamento pequeno mas suficiente. Teve tudo que precisamos.
As facilidades, como um telefone fixo, é realmente muito útil. 
Cama confortável, ar quente/frio.
Tudo ok.
reviews.response: Aiiiiii! Acabou o meu prazo para deixar a tua avaliação Josilene! Acabei de fazer ela, mas não ingressou! :-( Sinto muito, porque vocês mereciam uma boa avaliação realmente. :-( Agora estou em dívida com vocês.

reviews.comments:
Pros: 
This is a conveniently located apartment. Everything is within walking distance without being right downtown in a very noisy city. 
Anibal's photos and descriptions are accurate. 
Internet connection is good.
Heating system worked well.
The building seems quite secure. I never had an eerie feeling coming back late at night. 
Cons:
The size of the bathroom is small indeed, and the problem with drainage in the shower is an inconvenience. For these shortcomings I give this apartment four and not five stars, but overall I was content with my experience.
I felt very welcome and the apartment was very nice.
reviews.response: Thanks so much for your positive review Graham! Have a great life! ;-)

reviews.comments:
Anibal nos recebeu incrivelmente bem!
Ele é muito organizado e pensa em todos os detalhes para que a sua estadia seja boa.
O pequeno apartamento é impecável, perfeito para alguns dias em (URL HIDDEN) ótima localização.
Super recomendo.
reviews.response: Obrigado Maiara por dar uma avaliação tão boa! ^_^

reviews.comments: Anibal was extremely welcoming and was available whenever I had a question. The apartment was clean and had everything one could need and more! By that I mean there was a french press and coffee, movies on the internet TV, and even mugs chilling in the freezer! Really above and beyond! Thank you, Anibal, so much for creating such a homey environment! Abrazos!
reviews.response: Thanks Mary for such a positive review! :-O It was nice having hosted you as well. ^_^ Abrazón!

reviews.comments:
I didn't have the chance to meet Anibal in person but he was always available on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) and answered all my questions very quickly. He arranged my check in and check out with his aunt who is really kind. They were very flexible on the time of arrival and departure and I booked the apartment on very short notice so thank you very much. 
The place is great and as described in the add. There is everything needed and even more. There were juice, bread and butter in the fridge for my arrival. The apartment is comfortable and well located. I totally recommend this place.
reviews.response:
Hey Laura! :-s I'm soooooo sorry I didn't leave you a review! :-( I've been so busy that I missed it, and I feel bad that you've left me such a great one! :-((
Then thank you so much for having taken the time to give us such a positive review! I'm very happy that you've spent a good time in the Deptito. Its door keeps open for you to come back again whenever you'd like or need to! ^_^
Abrazón!

reviews.comments: Aníbal was a fantastic host. He met us the evening we arrived and showed us around the local area. Aníbal gave us lots of helpful tips and was always contactable. The unit is in a great location - easy walking distance to sights, restaurants, bars and markets. The unit itself perfectly equipped, we would definitely stay here again.
reviews.response:
Hey guys! Thanks so much for the positive review! I truly appreciate that. ^_^
Thanks also for having chosen our Deptito, and for sure you can come again whenever you want to! We'll give you friends' treatment if you do. ;-) Hahaha

reviews.comments: You know its going to be a great experience, when your host waits for you to arrive with breakfast ready! Absolutely amazing experice. From the start we had great communication and super accomodating!! Anibal is not only a great person, who I now consider a personal friend, but his apartment is great! Comfortable, clean, safe and at a great location. Highly, highly!!! recomended!
reviews.response: WOOOW!!! Muchas gracias mano!!! Sos un GRANDE. Realmente te agradezco esta evaluación tan positiva. Y ya sabes, te espero para rockearla juntos en el Cosckín 2017!!! ;-) Abrazón!

reviews.comments: Fantastic little flat, made our stay in cordoba extremely pleasant

I've been to Córdoba many times to visit family, and this was my first time staying on my own. We could not have asked for a better spot: a cozy bed, a good shower, a decently appointed kitchen, strong wifi and even a cell phone (and landline) for those traveling from abroad! Crucially, the apartment is a 10 minute walk from Nueva Córdoba/Guemes, the happening center of Córdoba nightlife, and a 10 minute walk from the center of town (Plaza San Martin)--close to everything without being in the middle of a loud neighborhood. Anibal was a great host - we went out for drinks the night we arrived and he had lots of great tips and ideas for things to do. Very attentive and helpful. We'll return!
reviews.response:
Thanks Clara for such a beautiful review! I didn't even expect this much. THANK YOU! :-D
Just come when you wish. Abrazones to Dan & to yourself! ^_^

reviews.comments: Aníbal's flat is nice and cosy, and we had a very welcoming arrival. The flat is only a 10 minute walk from the centre of Cordoba, and there are plenty of places to get breakfast, lunch or dinner close by.
reviews.response: Thank you Victoria for your nice review! ^_^

reviews.comments: Perfect apartment. Very close to the busstation. All the important places are in walkable distance. Area is very calm and nice. Aníbal is a great host who gave us a lot of information about his lovely city.
reviews.response:
Thank you so much Suzanne for posting such a good review! :-)
If it's like you said, you girls have your home in Cba then. ;-) S2

reviews.comments: Comfortable studio flat in a really great location. Both the bus station and centro is easily walkable. There is plenty of great shops and restaurants nearby. Kitchen was well equipped and the flat was bigger than expected. Anibal did a fantastic job looking after us. He is a welcoming and very friendly host and went out of his way to make sure we had a comfortable and fun stay in Córdoba. His aunt greeted us when we arrived, a lovely lady too, and she provided us with a small breakfast to get us up and running - really nice touch. A brilliant place to stay - would highly recommend.
reviews.response:
Thank you so much Georgina for such a great review & recommendation! :-D
I truly appreciate that. I hope we can meet each other again.
Abrazón!!! ;-)

reviews.comments:
Han (Anibal) is a very friendly man. He goes out of his way to make you feel welcome and to make sure that the apartment you experience is as much as it is described in the profile. On that point, he is very successful. The flat is *exactly* as described. It is clean and tidy and in a very convenient part of town. I didn't find it small at all, but the perfect size. Other people have commented about the shower, but I didn't find it a problem.

In summary, Han and his aunt are great people. Kind and helpful. The space is very nice. The location is perfect. It is a great place to spend a weekend or a month.
reviews.response:
Thanks Rob so much for such a good review! I truly appreciate it. Consider me as your point of contact with Cba, or even Argentina, for anything you might need from here.
Abrazón!!! :-)

reviews.comments: We had a great stay in Córdoba. Anibal was a great host,always available for any for any questions we had. The place itself is everything as advertised & in a very central location. We would recommend staying here if visiting Córdoba.

Due to floodings and a flat tyre I arrived in Cordoba after a desastrous 19-h-busride from Salta in the dead of night and quite deranged. Anibal was very helpful and nice: he would manage to leave the keys with the doorman, and even helped me with some issues concerning personal documents I had to solve the next day. The apartment is small, sunny and stylish, with stainless white linnen, comfortable beds and pillows. The overall level of cleanliness is certainly above Argentinian average. The next 2 days I fell ill and stayed mainly in the apartment: I found everything I needed to rest and was glad I could stay there. Because the room is so high up, almost no noise can be heard. Anibal also wanted to invite me for a concert, which was unfortunately not possible due to my condition. He proved to be a very competent, charming - and good looking! ; ) host.

I loved staying at Anibal apartment, it is in a great location very close to Patio Olmos. It is on a high floor which makes it very easy to sleep. You have everything you need in the apartment and more. He was also help me find many places in the city. You get great value for your money when you stay at Anibal apartment.
reviews.response: Thanks Steve! It's great that you found it that valuable. I hope you enjoy the rest of your stay here in Cba!

reviews.comments:
I have enjoyed my stay at Han's place.

Flat is very conveniently located, a short walk away from the city's main attractions, bars and restaurants.

Han showed himself as a flexible and accommodating host.

He had provided us with all the necessary information regarding the city and was always available in case any questions arose.

Flat in itself is very neat packing all the necessary equipment. Must be noted that it's a bit on a small side, but given the price and location it's a good value.

Thus I recommend the flat for other visitors.
reviews.response: Thank you so much Amir for having taken the time to write such a detailed review. I'm very happy and proud that you've enjoyed your stay in the Deptito and found it as a good value. I sincerely appreciate your recommendation. Cheers! ^_^

reviews.comments: L'appartement est très bien situé à proximité du centre ville. Il y a plein de petits commerces juste à côté de l'immeuble.
reviews.response: Thank you Roland for your positive review. It's been great hosting you, so you'll be welcome any time. Abrazo!

reviews.comments: Aníbal war sehr nett und hat uns vor Ort viele tips gegeben, was wir in Córdoba alles machen können. Die Wohnung liegt in Laufnähe zum Zentrum und ist klein aber fein. Schön hell, immer warmes Wasser in der Dusche, die Küche ist gut ausgestattet, um auch mal Spaghetti zu kochen und auch sonst war alles sauber. Vielen Dank für den angenehmen Aufenthalt in Córdoba!
reviews.response:
LOL! I obviously needed to pass that through the translator. X-D
Thank you so much for your generosity of leaving such a great review Katinka. You're more than welcome to come back any time you'd want to.
Cheers! ^_^

reviews.comments: Han was a great host! So welcoming, it felt like home. The location of the flat was good for us, the area was safe and a short walk into the city. The flat was very clean. Han was flexible with arrival / leaving times which we really appreciated. He also had the time to show us around the best bits of the city which we really enjoyed! Ate the best food because of this. We would highly recommend this flat! Thanks for a great stay in Córdoba Han!
reviews.response:
You're very welcome Rebe! Thank you so much for such a beautiful review. I loved the time I spent with you guys, so really look forward to meet you any other time.
Cheers! ;-D

reviews.comments: It was a really nice stay at this cozy studio. Anibal is very nice and cool. He made it possible for me to check in at 6 in the morning. And after the long bus ride I almost cried when I entered into the room having everything there and even fresh bread!! Also the location is convenient. Could walk to plaza espana and Parque Sarmiento(more than that). You can get everything you need downstairs. :)  Would love to go back to Cordoba but it is not gonna be easy.
reviews.response:
Thanks for the positive review Hui! :-D
Sad it's not gonna be easy, since you really had bad luck with the weather and you couldn't enjoy the best of Cba. :-(
So, anytime you find the opportunity, you'll be more than welcome to come! ;-)

reviews.comments: The apt is accurately like the pictures, very tidy and practical, as it seems like a studio. Well located, nearby to downtown, touristic spots, museums, bars, shopping malls and nightlife. Anibal is a great host, very concerned about your well being, provides informations and tips to get to know the city as a local and makes a special effort to communicate himself in portuguese, if you are a portuguese speaker. Nice example of an AirBnb host.
reviews.response: Obrigado cara!!! Prazer de ter hospedado vocês. Volte sempre!!! (na próxima eu não vou deixar vocês fugir sem experimentar o fernet, rsrsrs). ;-D

reviews.comments: Anibal was a great host and ensured our stay in Cordoba was fantastic. The apartment was as advertised. Good location in the heart of the city, clean with fast Internet. We highly recommend!!
reviews.response:
Thank you Damian for your positive review and recommendation!!! :-D
I'm so sorry that it seems I did something wrong with your review, and now I'm realizing that it wasn't submitted and I can't do it now because the review period has ended. :-(

reviews.comments: I had an excellent 8 night stay at this well located apartment in early April 2014. The apartment has everything you need from bed to kitchen and bathroom - all modern and in good condition. The owner was great at communicating during my stay, and when I did have one request he went above and beyond to make sure it was met and followed up on. All around kind and professional owner and fantastic place to stay while in Cordoba
reviews.response:
Thanks Austin! You'll be more than welcome at any time you want to come back. It's been a pleasure hosting you.
Keep "Funning"! ;-)

reviews.comments: what you see is what you get! exactly as described. we has a lovely time at anibal's flat. only down side the ongoing issue with the shower.

The appartment is well located and very well equipped, perfect for a short visit in Cordoba as we did. We didn't meet Anibal but communication with him was excellent. His aunt who gave us the keys was very welcoming, she's an adorable person and will explain you everything you need to know. We had a nice stay, thanks again Anibal!

Caro Anibal, 
Tivemos vários problemas com o apartamento que não íamos nem comentar para não sermos indelicados, mas diante das circunstâncias vamos relatar nossa experiência. Você deveria informar na descrição do imóvel que o apartamento é de fumantes, encontramos o apartamento com um cheiro terrível de cigarro, inclusive a roupa de cama, que nem parecia ter sido trocada, com manchas de sujeira, por isso é estranho você querer exigir limpeza da nossa parte, nunca tivemos problema com isso em todos os outros vários imóveis que já ficamos, pois todos tinham serviço de arrumadeira, se o seu não tinha esse serviço incluído, então não vale o preço que pagamos. Não tinha nenhuma informação sobre onde e como retirar o lixo, e não sei se lembra, mas deixamos o apartamento 1h da madrugada, precisávamos descansar para a viagem e não íamos preocupar com lixo nem arrumação de apartamento a essa hora, mesmo porque o certo é, indiferente de qualquer coisa, uma arrumadeira limpar o apartamento na saída dos hóspedes, se você não faz isso, pelo que parece, então está pondo em risco a saúde de quem hospeda no imóvel. Fora o banho que não pode ser por mais de 5 minutos que já inunda o banheiro, quando alguém sai para uma viagem não quer ter esse tipo de preocupação, principalmente quando se está em lua de mel, coisas que fomos descobrir somente quando chegamos aí. Quanto a tirar vantagem da sua tia, você mesmo disse que ela tinha interesse em comprar dólares e ela não me pareceu nem um pouco confusa quando nos comprou, pelo contrário, me pareceu bem esperta e não a obrigamos a comprar, bem como dissemos que não íamos vender pelo preço pago na casa de câmbio oficial, íamos vender pelo preço que já havíamos vendido no paralelo, ela entendeu e aceitou. Poderíamos dizer que você que tirou vantagem de dois turistas desinformados, quando perguntamos onde poderíamos trocar nossa moeda, ao invés de nos indicar onde poderíamos vender a um preço melhor, e você sabia disso, preferiu nos comprar e pagar o valor das casas de câmbio oficial, fazendo com que perdêssemos dinheiro, isso sim não me pareceu honesto. Resumindo, por toda a experiência, não recomendamos o apartamento para pessoas exigentes, que não querem ter preocupação com limpeza de apartamento, banheiro inundado e ficar com todas as roupas fedendo a cigarro quando saírem do apartamento, pelo mesmo valor existem imóveis melhores. 
Obrigado
Great host! So helpful upon arrival and super friendly! The studio is small but great for 2 people.  Within walking distance of all the cool parts if town.

We had a good time in Anibal apartment. He was very communicative and making sure that we have no problem since he was not there himself and his aunt was taking care of check in/ out, she was a very sweet lady.

This was our first visit to Cordoba. We loved the town and the location of the flat made it easy to walk to all the major points of interest in the town. The flat is small as described but quite comfortable for two people and very warm. We found the traffic a bit noisy with the window open but fine when closed.
The flat felt very safe and all the people in the shops and bars that we went into in the neighbourhood were very friendly.

Great apartment for exploring cordoba. You are a 20 minute walk to downtown and the historic center as well as nueva cordoba. The kitchen was perfect for the 2 of us as well as the living space. We really enjoyed it and would definitely stay here again. 

Anibal was very accommodating and had the apartment ready at late notice and also prepared us breakfast after a long bus ride.
reviews.response: Thank you Eliza for your recommendation! I hope you keep on enjoying Argentina, and that I can get to visit you at Cuzco soon. Send my regards to Jessy! :-)

reviews.comments: Aníbal and Corallia were the best hosts I've had from my AirBnB experience.  They were very helpful from the first moment, despite my late arrival.  They had everything prepared in the apartment, including coffee, tea, fruits, snacks, guides, local food.  Anibal had invited me out to gallery opening and other social events which was great.  The flat is compact and has everything you need - in a great location not too far from Nueva Cordoba. I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Cordoba.
reviews.response: Thanks Joe for such a great review! :-D I'm at Coralia's right now, and knowing that you've had such a great experience at our apt made us feel totally happy and proud. You know, you'll be more than welcome to come again at any time... Keep funning! ;-)

reviews.comments: This small apartment is very well organized and very well located from the main attraction. I was able to do everything from walking distance. I would go again if I have to go to Cordoba another time.
reviews.response:
Thanks Carle for your positive review. I'm glad you've felt comfortable in our studio.
Keep funning! ;-)
Abrazo.

reviews.comments: I had a very very pleasant stay in Hanibal's and Carolia's apartment. It was perfectly located in downtown Cordoba, about 10 minute walk from the city center (shopping center Patio Olmos). Hanibal and especially Carolia were very carying, providing me with lots of information, a Spanish mobile with card, a bus card, telephone numbers for emergency cases etc. They both make you feel home far away from home. The apartment is well equiped, perfectly for longer stays if you wish to cook and prepare your own meals. Bathroom is tiny, but there is everything there you need (especially hot water). The building has 14 stories, the apartment is in the 10th floor with a nice view (sometimes it can be a bit loud due to the traffic passing by). In the house there are mostly single apartments with students or young people (but it is not noisy). The best thing about the apartment was it perfect location, you can walk everything. Thank you
reviews.response:
Thanks Birgit for providing such a complete and positive review! :-D
I really feel honored that you had such a great experience at our studio and that you've felt so well with our company. You'll be more than welcome anytime you want to come back. It looks like my aunt and you have become friends, and now she's wanting to hear news from you! X-D
Un fuerte abrazo!

reviews.comments: Aníbal was a fantastic host and I really enjoyed my stay at the apartment and in Cordoba. He was very welcoming and knowledgeable of the city with many great recommendations of places to see and eat (Lomitos are in fact very delicious!). The apartment is clean, spacious, and well located. The shower had good water pressure and was super hot which was really nice!

We spent just a couple of days in Cordoba and stayed at Anibal's place. We dealt with Anibal via email and a coupe of phone conversations because he was out of town during our stay. It was a shame not to meet Anibal because he was lovely and very helpful throughout our conversations and checked we were comfortable in the apartment! His Aunt met us at the apartment and talked us through everything she was very nice too! The flat was clean and bright and more spacious than it appears it has everything you need and is in an area that is an easy walk to pretty much everything!
reviews.response: Thank you Susannah! Hopefully we can meet some time. Keep funning! ;-)

reviews.comments:
It was very pleasant to stay in this small apartment. Anibal was very helpful and friendly, making us feel that we were very welcome, and nothing was too much trouble. The apartment is well located for most areas of the city, and we found it easy to walk to find good restaurants, supermarkets etc. 
The apartmnt is well looked after and clean, and the bed is comfortable. AC is effective quickly on hot days. The kitchen is well equiped for basic needs.
We enjoyed our time here.

We had a pleasant stay! The apartment is bigger than it appears on pictures. The wifi is excellent, location is perfect.

The shower flooded the bathroom a bit, but it was not a big issue! Han, the host, is very friendly and willing to explain you everything about Cordoba. Communication was perfect through (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), mail, phone!

There is also a gym next door,  one day is $30, I got in two days for $40. The taxi from the airport will set you back $50.
Nice and well situated appartement. Well equipped too. Aníbal was most helpfull and friendly host we met. We would recommend him and his appartement to our friends.
Anibal was extremely accomadating and made sure I enjoyed my stay in Cordoba. Had no problems and would highly recommend this apartment.

our  5 nights from Oct 14 to Oct 19 2012
>The Host : Anibal replied to every single one of our messages in a timely manner , He arranged us with an early check in 8:30 on Saturday Morning
and did all he could to solve with the issues; even if we believe they could have easily been avoided with some attentions .
> The Flat :
we found it bigger than Anibal described it or pictures can show.
the one room apartment faces San Juan Street , traffic with somehow noise and pollution.
there is 2 big major building construction right next door ...
we have been waken up at 7 am twice out of 5 days.
The flat does NOT have its Own internet ,
The wifi connection is "borrowed" with password from Neighbors.
as a result , we found it unsecured , weak, unreliable and could not connect my wife IPad 2 days in the row.
>The Issues (we had and you will not uncounted believing Anibal dealing with it )
- Wifi of course .... Anibal will according to him get his own connection.
- When we checked in, the only window had no latch , absolutely missing,
it means noise and exhaust smells in room
I informed Anibal that Airbnb has been contacted and my payment put on Hold ...he fixed the window very same afternoon
-The shower
Bathroom got over flooded, somehow the water leak from the shower side or floor.
look for Video Cordoba Shower Stay
We contacted Anibal . He contact us back quickly and offered us to fix the problem, but we preferred not to have maintenance people come and go, 
since we will be stuck in the room till it's done and didn't want to waste our holiday.
after discussion he proposed us to help to find a new place ... wife and I refused for such short time being too much trouble.
He offered one night free...
So, we mopped the floor after every shower. 
all being said and after so many positive Airbnb Stays around the World we will review our Cordoba stay as  Average/Negative

Hanibal was a great and enthusiastic host, who warmly welcomed us and gave us good advice on where to go in Cordoba. The place is very nice and roomy, and has fully equiped kitchenett. Although we did not use it during our short stay. :-) The room is well located and we found everything we needed - shopping, bars, laundry, etc. - within walking distance. That clearly is the place to stay in Cordoba! ;-) Florian&Andrea
